    The program of the 2026 ISQBP President’s meeting will begin on Monday, June 15 at 13:30 with an opening ceremony and will end on Thursday, June 18 at 14:00 after a closing ceremony during which the poster prizes will be awarded and a window of free time for lunch. The full program will be available here

    A schematic draft is shown below

    Monday 15.06.2026    
    13:30 - 14:00 Opening ceremony    
    14:00 - 17:00 Session I    
    14:00 - 14:30 Plenary presentation Affiliation “Title TBA”
    14:30 - 15:00 Plenary presentation Affiliation “Title TBA”
    15:00 - 15:15 Selected presentation Affiliation “Title TBA”
    15:15 - 15:30 Selected presentation Affiliation “Title TBA”
    15:30 - 16:00 Coffee break    
    16:00 - 16:30 Plenary presentation Affiliation “Title TBA”
    16:30 - 17:00 Plenary presentation Affiliation “Title TBA”
    17:00 - 17:45 COMPUTATIONAL BIOLOGY AWARD LECTURE    
      Awardee lecture Affiliation “Title TBA”
    19:00 - open Dinner/Networking    


    Tuesday 16.06.2026
